segments.text: How could you have kept all of this from me?
segments.speaker: Mona

segments.text: I was going to tell you, but
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: But what?! You figured you'd get what you wanted and then dump her like you dumped Rachel!
segments.speaker: Dr. Green

segments.text: Hey! I did not dump Rachel!  Nor are we still together.  Can I just...  Why don't we just let the machine get that?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Hey Ross. It's Joey. There's a hooker over here and we thought maybe you'd know something about it.
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: No! No! No! No! No! I-I-I-Iâ€”I need to, I need to lie down.
segments.speaker: Ross
